Petition to change the announcer's speech for swain when he kills an enemy to "you have swain an enemy" or "an ally has been swain" rito please make this happen.
Then they also have to do "Viktory" if you win as Viktor
Give me Azir, now.
I'm just sitting over here hoping for Ao Shin sometime.

Please look into the Warwick bug where he Ults and then is unable to use his abilities afterwards. It's extremely frustrating that you can't Q/W after you R.
Also, I don't see any notes about name bars appearing in the middle/bottom of the character model. It's been appearing in Jarvan and Renekton and it makes it really hard to target when you're looking below the name and expecting the unit model to be there.

Yes! And there's also the bug where, after you ult, sometimes even when you activate your other skills, the cooldown doesn't display, so it seems like you have the ability available when you really don't.
{{champion:161}} Has a bug where if you ult at the very moment that you die, you cannot ult again in that game unless you reconnect.
Same with Vi's Q, if she Q's and uses it really quickly then it gets disabled. It says it's off cooldown, but you cant use it until you smartcast and then unsmartcast or log off and reconnect.
You can fix the {{champion:254}} bug way easier by pressing Alt+Q as if you were casting it on yourself

FTFY:

Fist yourself. Fix problems.
It's okay {{champion:14}} , next time you'll get your rework.
I'm not a very big fan of {{champion:102}} 's splash art, because I like it to feel like "I'm part dragon!" Not... "I'm a blue human with dragon armor!"
Incoming the noob {{champion:45}} s
Man, that final boss was so easy! Wait, here he comes again!

{{champion:9}} should have a circle around him when he drains so he knows if someone is close to walking out of the range or not.  And I also don't normally play{{champion:104}} by I think I may start now very soon because of this.  I do agree on that {{champion:150}} should have more health regain in his mini form if he will be played as a tank top lane because lets face it, hes very squishy early game.  When {{champion:68}} 's flamethrower got updated, It really bugged me alot that Riot did not update the the equalizer visul effects as well.  THANK GOD ALMIGHTY FOR THE {{champion:6}} BUFFS! Something that he has been needing for a very long time and how his basic attacks him be more faster like a ADC and also how his acid hunters restore mana on if you kill a unit (really good with{{item:3508}} , the cooldown and cost for "HKPR" is good and you get a slight shield from it is a nice touch. STILL waiting for them to make it so {{champion:101}} 's ult can be used to click somewhere on the map.  The {{champion:102}} splash is ok and the {{champion:67}} Splash is very nice but, Old champions that really need a new splash art is {{champion:19}} and {{champion:14}} , MAY I remind you of the one sided AXE! Am looking forward to using the Final Boss {{champion:45}} skin (WHICH I WILL BE BUYING!) and to be able to see the {{champion:157}} and {{champion:51}} skins will be cool too.  I hope Azir comes out soon and you will see me on the next patch notes like I always am. GAME ON!
